sn19.17:4.1: “Just now, Reverend, as I was descending from Vulture’s Peak Mountain I saw a monk flying through the air.
sn19.17:4.2: His outer robe, bowl, belt, and body were burning, blazing and glowing
sn19.17:4.4: “That monk used to be an bad monk in the time of Buddha Kassapa’s dispensation. …”
